Address.Address1: 150, CHEMIN AU PIED DE LA MONTAGNE

Description.Text: Location This hotel is situated within the famous ski resort village of Mont Tremblant, in the province of Quebec. Countless shops and entertainment venues are located only a few moments from the hotel, and it is only about 100 m to ski lifts, which guests may use to reach the pistes, the skiing school, or the cross-country tracks. In addition, the Mont Tremblant National Park is easily accessible, and the city of Montreal is around 1.5 hours by car from the hotel. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 114 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a dining area, a breakfast room, a café, a bar and a pub. Shopping facilities are available. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a TV room. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a kitchen and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace can be found in most accommodation units, offering additional comfort. The carpeted accommodation units feature separate bedrooms, a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe is also available. In addition, a fridge, a cooker, a microwave, tea and coffee making equipment and a dishwasher are available. Amenities include a washing machine and an ironing set. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The establishment offers outdoor sports options, including cycling/mountain biking, tennis, beach volleyball, crazy golf and golf. Guests of the establishment can have fun with watersports such as water skiing, windsurfing, jet skiing, a motorboat, pedal boat hire, a banana boat, canoeing, sailing and catamaraning. The establishment offers indoor sporting opportunities in the form of a gym. Various wellness options are offered, including a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, massage treatments, hydrotherapy and a solarium. There are excellent relaxation opportunities and ways to enjoy free time at the establishment, with options such as an entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
